website_summaries.verdict: The HTC U Ultra is an eye-catching unlocked phablet with powerful hardware and some unique features, but it's expensive and feels a bit half-baked.
pros: Sharp display with useful notification panel
Included USB-C earphones for personalized audio profile
cons: Reflective body is prone to fingerprints

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive phone
customer_reviews.text: Not showing LTE just 4g......tested it next to the Note 8 and it appears faster......also when the Note 8 could not get a signal the u ultra was still pulling up YouTube......I returned many phones back to Amazon because I was not please with the product.......I am beyond happy with the u ultra......good job HTC....I was going to returned it but the speed I was getting could not be ignored
customer_reviews.author: AkitaWebb

customer_reviews.title: Could not charge my phone after only having it for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Battery is poor. Finger print scanner stopped working after one week. Stopped charging completely only after 2 weeks. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Henriet B.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good phone
customer_reviews.text: The most useless smart phone in the market... I bought this Htc Utral thinking it would be a good idea, but thought wrong. The phone hang all the time, you have to reboot before you can use again.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: The phones are useless. Money to the trash bin
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2. And they were blocked in Colombia. HTC never could helped me by sending the FCC ID code. The phones are useless. Money to the trash bin. Please check carefully that the phones are usable in your country.
customer_reviews.author: leon dario arango merino

customer_reviews.title: ITS A REMANUFACTURE CELLPHONE
customer_reviews.text: This is a remanufacture cellphone, it was imposible to homologated or register in Colombie due it doesnt have a FCC. The IMEI is also altered. Its not an international cellphone because is imposible to legally register.
customer_reviews.author: Susana Gomez

customer_reviews.title: I love my new phone
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone. The best I've had to date. The speed is as fast as expected and the set up is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Don Osborne

customer_reviews.title: **** Warning **** I bought her two HTC Ultra and ...
customer_reviews.text: **** Warning **** I bought her two HTC Ultra and it are not dual sim, He is not a serious seller.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone!! Works with straight talk. Fast. Camera is good. Sound is good. I love love love the dual screen feature.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Decent unlocked phone
customer_reviews.text: When this phone came out alot of YouTubers gave it hate for costing too much for what it brings to the table. Being that it's 2018 this phone is a must buy. It has great camera and even though I don't use the second screen it's still useful for basic information. My only con is the phone doesn't have a headphone jack.
customer_reviews.author: KARL PERALTA

customer_reviews.title: htc A full - performance device and specifications created and ...
customer_reviews.text: htc A full - performance device and specifications created and seller of the content of the thresholds on the little but very good
customer_reviews.author: satoofy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a day
customer_reviews.text: What others have said about international phone is spot on, be sure that your sim card actually fits and is compatible. Returned the phone because after a day, not even connected to a carrier, it stopped working, wouldn't respond to touch, buttons, or plugging in. Unable to figure out why. Very frustrating since I had paid extra for expedited shipping, sim card didn't fit initially (why I still hadn't connected it to carrier), and still ended up purchasing a different phone, waiting for shipping, and the time it takes to get my returned money from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda J. Olson

product_meta.title: HTC U Ultra Factory Unlocked Phone - 5.7" Screen - 64GB - Black (International Version - No Warranty)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackHTC U Ultra Tech Specs Platform: Android 7.0 with HTC Sense CPU: Qualcomm Snapdragon 821, 64 bit quad-core, up to 2.15 Ghz Memory: ROM: 64GB, RAM: 4GB Available storage for users: about 50GB Extended memory: microSD up to 2TB (Use SIM2) Flex Storage supported Main Camera: 12MP (HTC UltraPixel 2 with 1.55_m pixel) Sapphire Lens Dual tone LED flash 4K video recording with 3D Audio, Hi-Res audio Video Pic Front Camera: 16MP, with HTC UltraPixel mode Selfie Panorama Full HD 1080p video recording Location: GPS, A-GPS, GLONASS, Beidou Sound: HTC Usonic HTC BoomSound Hi-Fi edition 4 mics 3D Audio recording Hi-Res audio stereo recording Hi-Res audio certified Noise cancelation Sensors: Ambient light sensor Proximity sensor Motion G-sensor Compass sensor Gyro sensor Magnetic sensor Fingerprint sensor Hub Gesture and Others: Always on voice commands Motion Launch Sensor Hub for activity tracking HTC Connect Quiet ring on pick up Pocket mode Flip to Mute Display: 5.7 inch, Quad HD (2560 x 1440 pixels) Pixel density at 513 ppi (pixel per inch) Super LCD 5 Corning Gorilla Glass 5 with curve edge Display color personalization Dual Display: 2.05 inch (160x1040 pixels) SIM Card Type: Nano SIM Connectivity: NFC Bluetooth 4.2 Wi-Fi: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac (2.4 & 5 GHz) HTC ConnectZ for wirelessly streaming media from the phone to compatible multi-room audio systems, TVs, portable speakers and home entertainment systems Streaming media from the phone to compatible Chromecast, DLNA, Airplay, Miracast Devices Buttons Keys and Connection Ports: USB 3.1 Gen 1, Type-C Capacitive keys DisplayPort Battery and Charging Speed: Capacity: 3000 mAh Talk time on 3G/4G network: up to 26 hours Standby time on 3G/4G network: up to 13 days Power saving mode Extreme power saving mode Quick Charge 3.0 2G: GSM/GPRS/EDGE:850/900/1800/1900 MHz 3G UMTS: AWS/850/900/1900/2100 (B4/B5/B8/B2/B1) 4G : FDD: Band: 1/2/3/4/5/7/8/12/17/20/28 TD LTE : Band: 38/39/40/41
feature_bullets: Dual Nano SIM; Works with GSM carriers; DOES NOT work with CDMA carriers.
5.7 inches, Super LCD5 capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors.
Rear Camera: 12 MP, f/1.8, 26mm, OIS, laser & phase detection autofocus, dual-LED (dual tone) flash ; Front Camera: 16 MP.
Qualcomm MSM8996 Snapdragon 821 Quad-core (2x2.15 GHz Kryo & 2x1.6 GHz Kryo) CPU ; 64 GB ROM, 4 GB RAM, Supports microSD up to 2 TB (uses SIM 2 slot)
